scripts.create:builder: docker buildx create --use --driver docker-container --name multi-platform-builder --node multi-platform-builder --bootstrap
scripts.build:image:all: docker buildx build --pull -t lewishadden/portfolio-api --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 --builder multi-platform-builder .
scripts.push:image:all: docker buildx build --push --pull -t lewishadden/portfolio-api --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 --builder multi-platform-builder .
